report.name: edsstr4

dataSource.name: Q_sg
dataSource.select: select distinct subq.polee Pole_emettteur, subq.lib_polee libelle_pe, subq.poler Pole_recepteur, subq.lib_poler libelle_pr, subq.factpid Ligne_receptrice, subq.factpty Type_receptrice, pack_verif_edsstr.f_cp(subq.factpid) Nom_receptrice, subq.ident Ressource, subq.rnom Nom_ress, subq.pid Ligne_emettrice, subq.ptype type_emettrice, pack_verif_edsstr.f_cp(subq.pid) Nom_emettrice, subq.pdsg DPG_ligne, pack_verif_edsstr.f_calcul(subq.poler,subq.polee,'1',subq.ident,subq.factpid,subq.pid,subq.soccode) consomme, subq.soccode societe from (select distinct pole_r poler, pack_utile.f_get_deppole(pole_r) lib_poler, pole_e polee, pack_utile.f_get_deppole(pole_e) lib_polee, p.factpid factpid, p.factpty factpty, tmp.ident ident, r.rnom rnom, p.pid pid, p.ptype ptype, tmp.codsg pdsg, tmp.societe soccode from tmpedsstr tmp, proplus p, ressource r, datdebex dx where r.ident=tmp.ident and p.tires=tmp.ident and tmp.pid_r=p.factpid and tmp.pid_e=p.pid and to_char(p.cdeb,'yyyy')=to_char(dx.datdebex,'yyyy') ) subq order by subq.soccode, subq.ident, subq.pid

dataDescriptor.expression: pack_verif_edsstr.f_calcul ( subq.poler , subq.polee , '1' , subq.ident , subq.factpid , subq.pid , subq.soccode )

function.name: afterpform
cf_1formula
function.textSource: function CF_1Formula return Number is nombre number(10,2); begin select nvl(sum(cusag),0) into nombre FROM tmpedsstr WHERE pole_e=:Pole_emettteur and pole_r=:Pole_recepteur and pid_r =:Ligne_receptrice and societe='SG..' ; return nombre; end;

function.name: cf_ssiiformula
function.textSource: function CF_ssiiFormula return Number is nombre number(10,2); begin select nvl(sum(cusag),0) into nombre FROM tmpedsstr WHERE pole_e=:Pole_emettteur and pole_r=:Pole_recepteur and pid_r =:Ligne_receptrice and societe <> 'SG..' ; return nombre; end;

function.name: f_datsitu_recente
cf_tot_poleformula
afterreport
